definition.text: It's not like we're trying to divine the future and will get graded on our accuracy! The prediction is more like an expectation!

paragraphs.text: Prediction: We expect either of these ideas to trade at least twice per month, with a 50% hit ratio.

Testing: For uptrends, we will set these targets: stop loss at 3% and take profit at 5%. For downtrends we should be more optimistic as the strategy aims to capture big market moves: we will set a 3% stop loss and 10% take profit targets.
Remember! This doesn't mean that is how we would manage the positions! It's just to evaluate the entry points!
